reviews.review_msg: He is the worst proffesor i have ever seen, Please do not even think about taking a course with him. He is friendly and tries his best to make us understand, but it is absolutely uselless. His finals are extremely hard and irrelevant.
Explains it all perfectly, homework and tests are fair and the workload is good. Funny guy! Makes you want to go to class! Always around for help and very interactive with the students. Great!!
